description:
Chad has received it official donation of Tambavy Covid-Organics [CVO] from the government delegation of Madagascar. They were transported by special aircraft.

description: In Madagascar, as of March 21, 2020, all churches, event spaces, bars and restaurants, sporting fixtures and cultural events are closed or cancelled.
In Madagascar, as of April 5, 2020, no public gatherings of more than 50 people are allowed (family gatherings, etc.).

In Madagascar, as of April 10, 2020, everyone must wear a face mask (or scarf that covers one's mouth and nose) while in the capital of Antananarivo. Anyone caught outside without a mask on will be detained by the police.
